body.name: Large Gothic Mirrors Wall Decor - 3 Piece Set 15.8 Inch Gothic Furniture Cathedral Mirrors - Whimsy Goth Valentines Home Decor for Dining Room, Living Room and Entryway - Witchy Gifts for Women

features: 【3-Piece Set】: This mirror set includes a total of 3 mirrors, one large measuring 15.8 x 8.6 inches and 2 small measuring 12 x 6.3 inches, being suitable for bathroom, entryway, fallway, living room, bedroom or even office. The mirrors can be installed independently or together for a unique display!

【Perfect Goth Home Decor】: Whether you want to add a spooky, elegant not to your house during Halloween, or you’re simply a fan of those unique gothic displays that create a beautiful ambiance, the Sepicello spooky room mirror is the perfect addition to your home!

【Superior Quality Craftsmanship】: Our vintage gothic mirror is made employing premium grade, highly durable materials, a combination of natural wood and superior quality glass with protective film, designed to withstand the test of time.
【Easy to Hang】: Unlike similar products on the market, this black vintage mirror is incredibly sturdy and lightweight, being easy to hang without requiring complicated mounting processes.

【Witchy Gifts Idea】: The Sepicello Victorian gothic decor large decorative mirror will make a fine gift idea for any special occasion, including Halloween, housewarming, holidays, birthday, wedding registry, for goth enthusiasts and more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! I’m impressed- get these now!
reviews.reviewText: This set of 3 mirrors is amazing. Super cool. If you like anything that is rustic, artistic, vintage, victorian, whimsical or just simply interesting and not your cookie cutter modern mirror! Well constructed and easy to hang. Great size. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beauty, Elegance, and surprisingly good construction!
reviews.reviewText: These did have some fingerprints on them out of the packing, and wiping that away with a microfiber cloth wasn't exactly easy around the decorative frames, but it did give me a chance to appreciate just how reflective and clear the mirror glass is. These are the kind of perfect clarity that can trick you into thinking a reflection is real- and the glass had no dings or scratches at all. The frames are wooden, which I definitely love over cheap plastic, though the wood grain does show and that might bother some people. The backs are sturdy board, and the nail hanging brackets protrude just enough to catch a good hold, but not so much so that they make the mirrors tilt forward, and I really liked that they have "teeth" for adjusting them, as in, if one is tilting crooked you can move it over on the nail by a tooth space to balance it.The weight of these is quite light, and even in my kind of thin walls a regular small nail each was plenty to get them on the wall safely. The charm they add above my bookcase immediately elevated my decor to "wow" factor, I am absolutely in love with how stylish and nice quality these are! I am so happy I got these, and I would recommend them absolutely! 5-stars!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern Gothic Dream
reviews.reviewText: These whimsical cathedral mirrors are like little portals to another world! The intricate detailing and dark finish adds a touch of witchy charm to any room, while the set of three gives you endless decorating possibilities. Perfect for a statement wall or adding a touch of gothic flair to any space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charming and well made!
reviews.reviewText: These gothic mirrors give exactly the vibe I was going for! The size is accurately described, but I do wish that they were just a little bit larger. Still, they are well made and I love the arched, 3 piece design. The frames are made of wood but are lightweight and easy to hang with just a single small nail. The mirrors are bright and reflective with no warping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Extremely nice quality mirrors with wood frames. These mirrors are detailed and ornate. They look gorgeous and fit the aesthetic perfectly. I am very happy with this product and believe that this is a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice gothic mirrors
reviews.reviewText: They are very nice gothic-style mirrors. They are not too big and they make a good decor for smaller places. The gothic design is great. The frames are made of lightweight wood so hanging does not need heavy-duty anchors. I love them.
